titleStmt.title: A collection of divers papers presented unto the Houses of Parliament by the Commissioners of Scotland since May last, 1645.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.
Buchanan, David, 1595?-1652?

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Octob. 15th";in imprint after London:"for Rob: Bostock"; at head of page [1]: "This preface forbidden by ye Scots Commissioners"; at foot of page [8]: "This preface written by David Buchanan".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
